mil7.6.3:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘peṇāhikāya dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni dve aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.6.3:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, peṇāhikā sakapatimhi usūyāya chāpake na posayati;
mil7.6.3:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sakamane kilese uppanne usūyāyitabbaṃ, satipaṭṭhānena sammāsaṃvarasusire pakkhipitvā manodvāre kāyagatāsati bhāvetabbā.
mil7.6.3:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, peṇāhikāya paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.6.3:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, peṇāhikā pavane divasaṃ gocaraṃ caritvā sāyaṃ pakkhigaṇaṃ upeti attano guttiyā;
mil7.6.3:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ekakena pavivekaṃ sevitabbaṃ saṃyojanaparimuttiyā, tatra ratiṃ alabhamānena upavādabhayaparirakkhaṇāya saṃghaṃ osaritvā saṃgharakkhitena vasitabbaṃ.
mil7.6.3:6.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, peṇāhikāya dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.6.3:6.4: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, brahmunā sahampatinā bhagavato santike—
